name: Legend of the Demigods
description:
You and a friend locate keys to escape the dungeon!

PLAYERS

2 Players (Mandatory)

OBJECTIVE

Once either player locates the key to the exit, both players must escape.
If a roaming monster catches them, they must restart the level.

CONTROLS - KEYBOARD

Player 1 Move                             Up, Left, Down, Right
Player 2 Move                             W, A, S, D
